p: Results are sensitive to the assumed risk of dying for PLHIV who have had their ART supply interrupted. This quantity is not well known or understood as such a disruption has not ever happened to HIV health services. In the model, PLHIV who experience an ART interruption experience a risk of progressing to AIDS and a further risk of progressing to death, resulting in an average monthly mortality risk of 0.24% in the main analysis. We also conducted a sensitivity analysis using three plausible values for this parameter, as mortality in the case of a forced interruption of ART could be lower or higher than previously observed ( TableÂ 3).
